episodes.title: Is scientology a cult? What would Lifton say?
episodes.description:
In this video I go through Robert J. Lifton's 8 criteria of thought reform and if I think they apply to scientology. 
#scientologist #whatisscientology #scientology #sptv #nomorekidsinscientology 
Links: 
Growing up in Scientology on lower conditions/punishment formulas: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GGqfEPQTiB0
My story with Kelli Copter: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WPlbLPv4_nY&t=741s
